description:
PPDGR software is designed for automated creation of package of documents required when registering juridical person (contains, but not limited private limited company / sole proprietorship) in Russia. PPDGR also can be used for creating an information container, used while sending registration documents online.

Common details:

PPDGR software replaces PFDGR software.
summary: PPDGR software is designed for automated creation of package of documents required when registering juridical person in Russia
author: АО "ГНИВЦ"
